title: Make URF great again

embed.title: URF ACTUAL Spotlight
embed.description: ■ TWITTER - http://twitter.com/themattcastro ■ MERCH STORE: https://shop.bbtv.com/collections/magikarpusedfly ► SEND MAIL: PO BOX 248 San Marcos CA 92079 ► SNAPCHAT - heyitsmagikarp ► INSTAGRAM - https://instagram.com/magikarpusedfly ► TWITCH - http://twitch.tv/magikarpusedflylol ═════════════════════════════════════ ►Join Discord: https://goo.gl/QmwJXH ►Join my Discord Server: http://discord.gg/magikarpusedfly Play FAN GAMES by joining the Discord Server and get notified whenever I'm starting a fan game.

body:
Dear Riot,
we, the community, adore URF so much. Some people only wait for URF and dont even play any other modes anymore.
So for the love of god please give us Draft-URF back.
In its current state (as adressed in the video, all credits to MagikarpUsedFly) you just sit in the lobby wait untill you see your enemys for like half a secound and already know if you´re gonna be buttfucked for 20 minutes or if its gonna be fun for you.
But the thing I hate the most is that I cant choose to play someone I think is fun in the mode. I have to pray to the LoL-Gods and bring forth the biggest sacrifices to maybe, JUST MAYBE get the slimmest chance of getting the Champion I wanna test out. For example I would want to play my mains in this gamemode just for fun and trying them out, BUT NO I cant because insert Kiandy´s altered mentally challenged voice here All Random is so fun combined with this mode hahahahahaha - no ... no its not... just stop please. Give Draft URF back or at least make it AR for one time and the next time Draft.
Thank you for listening to me and have a nice day. :)
